text: Once a wolf, after catching a lamb in a flock, dragged it to its lair. But a lion watching him came out and snatched him away. I annoy the wolf, and keeping a prudent distance, he cried out: "You unjustly take away what is mine! And the lion laughed, and said to him, Come, tell me, thou hast received him well from a friend. What has been wrong will be lost.
title: El lobo y el león
author: nan Esopo
